message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $1200000 for this exceptional item.

Alice, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Given the product's value to me, I'm willing to pay $950000. I believe this is a fair price that benefits both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to present a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I propose a price of $1075000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1075000 is still a bit higher than I can justify. I'm willing to go up to $1000000, which is a fair price considering the product's value and our mutual goals. I'm confident we can find common ground at this price.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. Considering the value of the product and our ongoing negotiations, I propose a final price of $1050000.
